body: Some package, for example [WRF](https://www.mmm.ucar.edu/weather-research-and-forecasting-model) requires answering questions interactively during `./configure` to generate a proper config file.  EasyBuild 'emulates' to answer questions during configure http://easybuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Typical_workflow_example_with_WRF.html . I wonder how to  do it in Spack.
title: How to handle interactive configure?
